name: KIKI TEE
description:
The Kiki Tee is the "Queen of T(ea)se".  With its contrasting feature neckline, raglan sleeves and contoured bodice, this will be your go-to top. 

Effortlessly stylish and wearable, team it back with your favourite separates.  This jersey top is made from a viscose/elastane blend.

image 1: CHERRY/jasper
image 2: NAVY/cherry
image 3: SURF/black
image 4: BLACK/jasper
image 5: RED/black & ELECTRIC/surf...image coming soon

name: KYOMI JERSEY TOP
description:
The Kyomi Jersey Top is the love-child of the Kingfisher Kimono and the Nandini (2 popular Sprinkle tops).  

Made from a soft, supple jersey, this V-necked top drapes over the shoulders and bust and dips to a fitted bodice.  It is made from a viscose/elastane blend.

image 1:  ELECTRIC
image 2:  CHERRY (seen under Kabuki Cropped Kimono)
image 3:  DRAGON
image 4:  JASPER
image 5:  SURF & NAVY...image coming soon

also available in BLACK

name: KABUKI CROPPED KIMONO
description:
The Kabuki Cropped Kimono can be worn open for an elegant draped effect, or buttoned up for soft tailing.

The ultimate contemporary cardie, the Kabuki is sure to be an instant classic...with a twist!

image 2: BLACK...SOLD OUT

image 4: ROYAL & ORANGE

name: HARUMI WRAP TOP
description:
The ‘springtime beauty’ Harumi Wrap Top, is the ultimate in feminine allure.  With its petal sleeves,  contrasting border detail, sweetheart neckline and peplum, this versatile top can easily morph from sleek daywear into glam eveningwear.

description:
With its sleeveless, bordered, minimalist lines, the Marina Wrap Dress is the ultimate hot weather hot little number.  It is both sexy and playful, and what’s more, it doesn’t crease, making it the perfect travelling companion!

name: KYO KIMONO WRAP DRESS
description:
By popular demand, the Kimono sleeved wrap dress is back! 

The Kyo Kimono Wrap Dress features regal sweeping lines, contrast borders and Obi ties.

name: PEGGY SUE WRAP DRESS
description:
Perfect for hot summer days and nights, the sleeveless Peggy Sue Wrap Dress has a contrast band and sweetheart neckline.

For this season, Peggy Sue swaps the “wiggle in her walk & giggle in her talk” for the funky grooves of the 1970s soul train.

Why not sass up the Peggy Sue Wrap Dress with a pair of Espadrilles or killer wedges, and walk on the wild side.

name: BELLA FIORA WRAP DRESS
description:
The Italian translation of Bella Fiora is beautiful flower. Reminiscent of a flower in bloom, this very flattering dress with it's petal sleeves and sweetheart neckline is sure to brighten anyone's day.

Like with all of the wrap dresses, for the best fit, fit to your bodice and let the bias cut skirt work it's magic.

name: SAVANNAH WRAP DRESS
description:
Like the expanse of the Savannah landscape, this versatile wrap dress offers you the freedom to move and ability to go from day to night.

The Savannah Wrap Dress also features a new sleeve length.  Falling to the mid upper-arm, the loose bell shape sleeve guarantees coverage without sacrificing summer comfort.

name: LILIANA WRAP DRESS
description:
The bias cut Liliana Wrap Dress, with its contrast border and 3/4 length bell-sleeve, is an elegant and timeless classic that can easily be worn for both casual and formal occasions.

All our jersey wrap dresses don't crease and are the perfect travel companion!

name: MONTE CARLO SLING
description:
Flattering and feminine the 3/4 sleeve Monte Carlo Sling with it's sexy draped neckline, is perfect to wear both casually and for more formal occasions.
If you want to be a bit more demure, wear this top with a camisole underneath.
Like all of Sprinkle's pieces each style and colour way is a limited edition made right here in Melbourne.

Colourways Available include:-

image 2: 
a. OATMEAL
b. SUDAN

image 3:
a. SAND
b. BLACK
c. NAVY

name: KINGFISHER KIMONO
description:
The Kingfisher Kimono, named after the brightly coloured Kingfisher bird, is super flattering and oh so comfortable!

The shape of the bodice and drape of the neckline ensure this top suits women of varying shapes and bust sizes.

image 1: MAGENTA (viscose/elastane)

image 2: 
a. ZEBRA (poly/spandex)
b. ROYAL (viscose/elastane)

image 3.
c. CHIANTI (viscose/elastane)
d. LEOPARD (poly/spandex)
e. JASPER (viscose/elastane)

name: NANDINI TOP
description:
The Nandini Top is another exciting new design from Sprinkle.  Made from a soft, supple knit jersey, this stylish top drapes gracefully from the shoulders to fitted waist and hips.  It has a great neckline for women of varying bust sizes.


IMAGE 1: DRAGON/black  (viscose/elastane)

IMAGE 2:  (viscose/elastane)
a. CHIANTI/black
b. JASPER/khaki
c. MAGENTA/black

a. SAHARA/koi
b. ZEBRA/henna
c. LEOPARD/black

name: WILDWOOD SKIRT
description:
Whilst the contrast back pleat and side panels add to the drama of the Wildwood Skirt,  the feature pockets with button detailing enhances its functionality.

The curved front panel also adds to the illusion of a smaller waistline...You gotta luv that!

IMAGE 1:
a. STONE/royal
b. STONE/royal (back detailing)

IMAGE 2:
a. OCEAN/olive
b. BLACK/ocean

IMAGE 3:
c. CHARCOAL/black
d. ROYAL/charcoal
e. OLIVE/stone

also have BLACK/charcoal

name: HOLLOWAY SKIRT
description:
The HOLLOWAY SKIRT is named after the fictional femme fatale, Joan Holloway from the hit TV series Mad Men.  This sexy skirt, with pocket and waistline detailing  is designed to contour your womanly curves. 

Wear with either a blouse tucked into the waist or a top with nipped in waist worn over the skirt

The Holloway Pencil Skirt is made from a cotton spandex drill. If you like a tight fit, you may want to chose 1 size smaller than normal.


Colourway available include:-
BLACK with black piping
BLACK with red piping
BLACK with wheat piping
BLACK with bl/wh striped piping
NAVY
RED
BLACK SELF STRIPE

name: BORN FREE SKIRT
description:
As the name suggests this 1970's inspired wrap skirt, with its sweeping contrast panels, allows you freedom to move, is super comfortable, stylish and fun! 

It also looks great teamed back with the Kingfisher Kimono, Monte Carlo Sling & Nandini Top.

IMAGE 1: NAVY/ocean/cloud

IMAGE 2: KHAKI/camel/cloud

IMAGE3:
a. BLACK/red
b. BLACK/camel

name: LILY OF THE VALLEY WRAP TOP
description:
ON SALE!!!  Was $245 now $180

Based on the Bella Fiora wrap dress the Lily of the Valley top, with it's feminine petal sleeves and sweetheart neckline, is a must have to brighten up your summer wardrobe.

Team back with a pencil skirt, capri pant or even a pair of high waisted jeans for a decidedly vintage flavour.

Like all of Sprinkle's pieces each style and colour way is a limited edition made right here in Melbourne

IMAGE 1: Yellow Petal
IMAGE 2: all colourways

name: CREME DE MENTHE COWL
description:
The Creme de Menthe cowl, with it's liquid like drape feels divine on, looks super sexy and can be worn for both casual and dressy occasions.

For a 1950's look, tuck the top into the Audrey Box Pleat skirt or a pencil skirt and complete the look with a wide feature belt.  Or why not wear the Creme De Menthe Cowl over a skirt or cropped pant with a skinny belt.

Like all of Sprinkle's pieces each style and colour way is a limited edition made right here in Melbourne.

image 1: AQUA (viscose)
image 2: CHAINMAIL (viscose/polyester)
               IVORY (silk/viscose)
               ELECTRIC (silk/viscose)
               BLACK (acetate/spandex)

name: FIFTH AVENUE BLOUSE
description:
When one thinks of Fifth Avenue , images of glamorous fashion, high end jewels and fancy cocktails come to mind.

The Fifth Avenue blouse, with it's cascading neckline & feminine sleeve will take you from boardroom to the cocktail bar.

Timeless and classic, the Fifth Avenue Ruffle Blouse is just perfect worn with a tailored skirt or trousers.

AVAILABLE COLOURS:

image 1 (insert):  WHITE POLKADOT with Red contrast (Silk)- SOLD OUT
image 1:  PAINT SPLASH  with Bl. contrast (linen blend)
image 2:  BLACK Broderie (silk/cotton)
image 3:  RED with Black contrast - SOLD OUT

name: SHAKE & STIR SHEATH
description:
The decidedly sexy Shake & Stir Sheath is for the connoisseur of finer things in life. 

The silk overlay can be ruched to reveal your shoulders or for a more demure feel, loosen off the ties and create a blouson effect. 

The body of the dress is made from a cotton blend with spandex, so it is oh so comfortable!

image 1: BLUE/black (SOLD OUT)
image 2: BUBBLES/black
image 3: BLACK/black

RED/black (SOLD OUT)

name: MEREDITH WRAP DRESS
description:
ON SALE... WAS $299 NOW $200

The MEREDITH WRAP DRESS is elegant and timeless and crosses many age barriers.Wear with confidence and a air of sophistication.

Contouring the womanly form, this dress falls gracefully from the hips and is like a second skin.

Like with all of the wrap dresses, for the best fit, fit to your bodice and let the bias cut skirt work it's magic.

COLOURWAYS AVAILABLE include

This stunning dress is cut on the bias, designed to taper in at the waist, and falls gracefully from the hips.   Enjoy

description:
The Daphne Wrap Top, featuring a contrast keyhole neckline and ties, is a statement top that can be worn both casually and formally.

name: BELLADONNA WOOL TOP
description:
The BELLADONNA WOOL TOP, with its bustiere silhouette & scooped boat neck, is deliciously sexy whilst maintaining an elegant edge.  

The bustiere bodice is made from wool and the contrast lace jacquard sleeves & upper bodice is made from a wool/nylon blend.

image 2: PETROL/black jacquard

name: VENUS FLYTRAP WOOL DRESS
description:
The VENUS FLYTRAP WOOL DRESS is a must have.  Wear with coloured tights and boots for a fun approach to winter dressing.

Although this wool/blend dress looks like a wrap dress, it is actually a slip on dress.  

Incredibly comfortable and flattering, the VENUS FLYTRAP WOOL DRESS will keep warm whilst looking HOT!

image 1: BLACK/eucalyptus
image 2: ROYAL/black 
image 3: BLACK/charcoal

(please note the Red Merino Wool scarf available for purchase is slightly wider than the scarf shown.  There is also a black version which is a similar width to scarf shown in image)

name: DOMINA WOOL WRAP TOP
description:
ON SALE....WAS $265 NOW $210

The DOMINA WOOL WRAP TOP, with its pleated distinctive collar, looks very stylish worn with a tailored pair of pants or skirt. It also is great worn with a pair of jeans....versatile!

name: FORBIDDEN FRUITS SILK BLOUSE
description:
The FORBIDDEN FRUITS SILK BLOUSE simultaneously reveals and conceals the décolletage with its bustier like bodice.

This subtle illusion is achieved with the selective use of the sheerest of silks and topped with a crisply-cornered collar.

The luxurious Forbidden Fruits Silk Blouse looks equally divine worn buttoned up the neck or left softly open to create a deeper neckline.

description:
...ON SALE... 

WAS $299 NOW $200

The MARQUESA WRAPDRESS with its Shawl Collar, modestly cloaks whilst revealing a hint of décolletage.    

From office to fine dining, this very versatile dress is cut on the bias, designed to taper in at the waist, and falls gracefully from the hips.  

As a general rule this is about knee length.

As with all Sprinkle garments, this is a limited edition.

name: BARDOT WOOL WRAP DRESS
description:
...ON SALE...

WAS $340 NOW $270

The BARDOT WOOL WRAP DRESS is made from a ribbed wool. 
Not only does this woolen wrap dress feels glorious on, it is an essential winter piece which offers warmth and style.

With its retro inspired sweet heart neckline, the BARDOT WOOL WRAP DRESS contours the womanly form falling to the knee-line. 

NB: as this dress is a ribbed wool, you may want to chose a smaller size.

image 1: RED
image 2: BLACK
image 3: BLACK/ocelot

name: HOODED WOOL LEATHER DRAWSTRING JUMPER
description:
...ON SALES...
WAS $285 NOW $225

This stunning HOODED WOOL LEATHER DRAWSTRING JUMPER has a big bellowy hood and leather drawstring detailing that can be adjusted to suit your taste. 

This all time favourite Sprinkle jumper is great worn for both casual and dressy affairs. A stunning piece that will be well luved throughout the years.

image 2: RED (N.Z. merino wool)
image 3: CREAM (wool)

please note the BLACK hoodies size big, so think about dropping down a size.

name: CONSTANTINE COWL
description:
...ON SALE...

WAS $220/$225 NOW $175

Feminine and flattering, the CONSTANTINE COWL, with its sexy draped neckline, is a versatile trans-seasonal garment that can be worn both smart casually and for more formal occasions.

For a sassy look, why not tuck the Constantine Cowl into a high waisted skirt and accessorise with a necklace that plunges into the décolletage?

description:
The CITIZEN KANE VEST with its scooped neckline & contrast detailing means business!

Bold in concept but elegantly simple in design, this vest is the perfect accompaniment for pants or skirts when it’s time to roll up your sleeves.

This is a limited edition.

description:
...ON SALE...

JERSEY...WAS $230 NOW $175

The BELLE DU JOUR TOP is gathered softly under the bust, then shapes to the waist and hips. With its contrasting border and button detailing at the neck & sleeves, this eye catching top is a beautifully crafted daywear essential.

ON SALE... WAS $299 NOW $200

So named for the stunning embossed ocelot print in this dress, the KITTYCAT WRAP DRESS has a distinctly vintage flavour with its sweetheart neckline and scooped hemline.

Contouring the womanly form, this bias cut dress falls gracefully from the hips.  This is a limited edition

name: ROCKABILLY WRAP TOP
description:
ON SALE... WAS $220 NOW $160

The ROCKABILLY WRAP TOP, so named because of the stunning embossed ocelot fabric used,  tapers in at the waist and has a peplum which is perfect for contouring the hips.

This very versatile top  looks great worn both casually  or dressed up with a smart pair of pants or a tailored skirt.

Please Note:  this fabric stretches a little less than some of the other fabrics.  If you want more coverage across the bust, you may want to consider going up a size.

name: SPRINKLE EMPORIUM Gift voucher
description:
Be it Christmas, Easter, mothers day a birthday or just because a Sprinkle Emporium gift voucher is a great gift idea.

Available in any value, we can send them to the recipient on your behalf or to you.

If you do not see the amount you require in the drop down menu simply contact us via email- info@sprinkle.com.au or phone 03) 9387 9262

TO RETURN TO MAIN MENU, CLICK ON SPRINKLE EMPORIUM LOGO AT TOP LEFT
